name: Umhlanga Main Beach
description: Golden sands and warm Indian Ocean waters — perfect for swimming or relaxing.

name: Umhlanga Pier & Lighthouse
description: Iconic landmarks with stunning sunrise and sunset views over the ocean.

name: Umhlanga Promenade
description: Scenic coastal walkway lined with cafés and restaurants — great for morning jogs.

name: Oceans Mall & Umhlanga Village
description: Boutiques, fine dining, and local nightlife just minutes away.

name: Umhlanga Lagoon Nature Reserve
description: Coastal forest trails and wooden bridges leading to the beach — ideal for birdwatching.

name: Hawaan Forest Nature Reserve
description: A peaceful protected dune forest with walking trails and indigenous flora.

name: Gateway Theatre of Shopping
description: Massive mall with hundreds of shops, restaurants, cinemas, and entertainment venues.

name: KwaZulu-Natal Sharks Board
description: Educational marine centre with shark conservation exhibits and demonstrations.

name: Chris Saunders Park
description: Landscaped park perfect for picnics, open-air events, and relaxation.

name: uShaka Marine World
description: World-class aquarium and water park with dolphin shows and slides for all ages.

name: Moses Mabhida Stadium
description: Panoramic city and ocean views via the SkyCar, plus adventure activities.

name: Durban Beachfront – Golden Mile
description: Lively beachfront with cafés, markets, and activities like surfing and cycling.

name: People’s Park & Blue Lagoon Park
description: Open green spaces for walks, kite-flying, and riverside picnics.

name: Durban Botanic Gardens
description: Africa’s oldest botanical garden — peaceful and full of exotic plants.

name: Victoria Street Market (Indian Quarter)
description: Vibrant indoor market for spices, crafts, and local culture.

name: Durban Natural Science Museum
description: Fascinating museum showcasing fossils, birds, and regional natural history.

name: Phezulu Safari Park
description: Zulu cultural shows, wildlife encounters, and panoramic valley views.

name: Valley of a Thousand Hills
description: Scenic drives, hiking, and cultural villages — a must-do full-day trip.
